ETrun server binaries
=====================

Windows
-------

Put qagame_mp_x86.dll or qagame_mp_x64.dll in etrun/ folder.

Linux
-----

Put qagame.mp.i386.so or qagame.mp.x64.so in etrun/ folder.

MacOS
-----

Put qagame_mac in etrun/ folder.

Compatibility
-------------

Refer to https://github.com/ETrun/ETrun/blob/master/README.md for more information.


Starting a game server
----------------------

Don't forget to include ETrun client file package (.pk3) in your etrun folder aswell.

Start game with +set fs_game etrun.

Refer to https://github.com/ETrun/ETrun/wiki/ETrun-cvars to setup your server.
